mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Hot Line - Late News", "Fashion Feature", "National Square Dance Convention", "Singles Directory - 1973", "Youth on the Square", "A History of Square Dancing", "Smoother Dancing Poster", "Take a Good Look - Cloverflo", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Square Dance Diary", "Paging the Round Dancers: Howard and Phyllis Swanson", "National Convention Scrapbook", "Callers Text - Chapter Twenty-Seven", "Ladies on the Square", "Style Lab - All Four Couples Flutterwheel and Sweep a Quarter", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Callers/Teachers Workshop", "Caller of the Month: Wally Cook", "On the Record: Reviews", and "Square Dance Date Book".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
